title: Mexico 75: no place else in the world to be
creator_credit: Patricia Edgar and Centre for the Study of Educational Communication and Media, LaTrobe University
brief_description: A record of the International Women’s Conference in Mexico City in 1975. The film sets the Conference in the context of an underdeveloped country and discusses the relevance of the women’s movement to third world countries. There is special emphasis on the contribution of the Australian delegation.
